title-group.article-title: IMPROVED RESULTS ON THE MERTENS CONJECTURE

abstract.p: In this article, we study the Mertens conjecture. We revisit and improve the original constructive disproof of János Pintz. We obtain a new lower bound for the minimal counterexample and new numerical results for this conjecture.
